Tween

Methods

TweenPosition(Tween.TweenType, Single, Single, Single, Action<Single, Single>, Action)

Moves the scroll position over time between two points given an easing function. When the tween is complete it will fire the jumpComplete delegate.

Declaration
public IEnumerator TweenPosition(Tween.TweenType tweenType, float time, float start, float end, Action<float, float> tweenUpdated, Action tweenComplete)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Tween.TweenType tweenType

The type of easing to use
System.Single time

The amount of time to interpolate

The starting scroll position

The ending scroll position
